nodes.documentation:
@title Permanent, linearly-distributed vesting with cliff for specified token.
Vested accounts can check how many tokens they can withdraw from this smart contract by calling
`releasableAmount` function. If they want to withdraw these tokens, they create a transaction
to a `release` function, specifying the account to release tokens from as an argument.
nodes.name: CliffTokenVesting
releasableAmount
release
addBeneficiary
vestedAmount

addBeneficiary(address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Allows to vest tokens for beneficiary.Tokens for vesting will be withdrawn from `msg.sender`'s account. Sender must first approve this amount for the smart contract.

releasableAmount(address).notice: Calculates the releaseable amount of tokens at the current time.

release(address).notice: Transfers available vested tokens to the beneficiary.The transaction fails if releasable amount = 0, or tokens for `account` are not vested.

params.amount: How much tokens in decimals to withdraw.
params.start: The absolute date of vesting start in unix seconds.

devdoc.title: Permanent, linearly-distributed vesting with cliff for specified token. Vested accounts can check how many tokens they can withdraw from this smart contract by calling `releasableAmount` function. If they want to withdraw these tokens, they create a transaction to a `release` function, specifying the account to release tokens from as an argument.
